tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE medication_adherence (
  patient_id INT,
  medication_name VARCHAR(255),
  dosage_mg INT,
  adherence_percentage DECIMAL(5,2),
  recorded_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patient_medication (
  patient_id INT,
  medication_name TEXT,
  dosage_amount FLOAT,
  dosage_frequency TEXT,
  dosage_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE medication_history (
  history_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  medication_name TEXT,
  dosage_amount FLOAT,
  dosage_time TIME,
  adherence_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE medications (
    medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    medication_name VARCHAR(50),
    dosage FLOAT,
    frequency VARCHAR(20),
    reason VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE medication_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    medication_id INT,
    dosage_taken FLOAT,
    date_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES medications(medication_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  date_of_birth DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Medications (
  med_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  med_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  dosage VARCHAR(20),
  frequency VARCHAR(20),
  med_type VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Adherence (
  adherence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  med_id INT,
  adherence_status VARCHAR(10),
  dosage_taken VARCHAR(20),
  date_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE WearableDevices (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  patient_id INT,
  last_sync TIMESTAMP,
  battery_status INT
);

CREATE TABLE DosageHistory (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  med_id INT,
  dosage_taken VARCHAR(20),
  date_time TIMESTAMP
);
